name: Wine
description:
I don't know how long I've been wandering...

All I can do is keep hydrated and try and stay alive...

A hasty game jam project made for the Mix and Jam 2019 with the inspiration of "Dimension Change": taking one mechanic and adding or subtracting a dimension. I definitely got lost in the making of this one and didn't end up testing it very well - but I managed to test out a perspective flip I've always thought about doing!
